amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the investment of funds as called for in the Depot Maintenance Strategy and Master Plan of the Air Force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2447 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2447 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12505-12506) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the investment of funds as called for in the Depot Maintenance Strategy and Master Plan of the Air Force.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2447 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2447 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hatch.
